message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,000. I believe this is a fair offer considering the benefits it will bring to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,250? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $9,500. How about we meet in the middle again, at $9,875? I'm willing to make a bit of a concession, but I'm not sure I can go much higher than that.
